features: GLOWS IN THE DARK: These night pacifiers for baby glow in the dark, making it easy for you to locate quickly at night without any stumbling and searching, so your baby can sleep better.
SYMMETRICAL DESIGN: The breastfeed SkinSoft pacifier for babies is fun and functional. The curved shield with wide openings are always right-side up and prevent skin irritation with maximum airflow.
SELF - STERILIZING CASE: Add water and pop into the microwave to sterilize MAM silicone pacifiers 16+ months in just 3 minutes and store in case for at home and travel to protect the pacifiers.
FLEXIBLE SHAPE FOR 16+ MONTH BABY : The nipple on these pacifiers for babies is 60% thinner and 4x more flexible than average, exerting less pressure on the mouth in order to avoid jaw deformations.

HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies, our 100% BPA & BPS free orthodontic silicone pacifiers meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable while being soft and flexible for your baby's comfort.
body.description: No more frustration trying to find your lost pacifiers at night! This pacifier glows in the dark, making it easy for baby and parent to find in the evening hours. Specially designed with your little one’s teeth and jaw in mind, the MAM Perfect Pacifier is clinically proven* to reduce the risk of open bite and increased overbite later in life. With a 60% thinner neck and 4 times more flexible nipple** than a regular pacifier, you can be assured that your little one’s favorite binky is safe for their development as it puts less pressure on their jaw and teeth. MAM’s medically engineered nipples feature life-like, SkinSoft textured silicone that feels more natural, just like mom. With multiple nipple and shield sizes to pick from, MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested***.Babies simply love the ease and comfort of latching onto MAM nipples. Sterilize baby’s MAM pacifier in the microwave using the convenient MAM self-sterilizing storage case. Microwave disinfection is proven effective in killing common household germs and bacteria. Pacifiers kept in the closed box will remain disinfected for up to 48 hours: Fill pacifier case with water. Place pacifier in the pacifier case with the nipple facing down. Follow Pacifier package instructions for microwave setting. Cool completely before use.*Y. Wagner, R. Heinrich-Weltzien, “Effect of a thinneck pacifier on primary dentition: a randomized controlled trial”, Orthodontics & Craniofacial Research, Volume 19, Issue 3, pages 127–136, August 2016. **Scientific reports from Wild Hi-Precision institute verify: the MAM Perfect’s teat neck is on average 60% thinner; test series by the University Clinic of Dentistry Vienna confirm: it is also on average 4 times more flexible than comparable soothers. (Between: 32% – 83% thinner / 1.1 – 19.5 times more flexible than regular silicone soothers). *** Market Research 2009-2017, tested with 1,508 babies.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Inspect carefully before each use. Pull the pacifier in all directions. Throw away at the first signs of damage or weakness. Only use dedicated pacifier holders tested to EN 12586. Never attach other ribbons or cords to a pacifier, your child may be strangled by them. Do not leave a pacifier in direct sunlight or near a source of heat or leave in sterilizing solution for longer than recommended, as this may weaken the nipple.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 45 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. MAM Perfect Night Orthodontic Pacifier 2 Nighttime Glow-in-the-Dark Pacifiers MAM's BPA/BPS-free MAM Perfect Night Pacifiers have been developed by pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 16+ months*. MAM’s pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society Perfect nipple reduces the risk of misaligned teeth Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Shield openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe Glow in the dark feature makes it easy for baby to find at night
Air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Extra thin and flexible nipple allows room for teeth to grow SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel Easy to find at night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LO says this is the best pacifier on the market.
reviews.reviewText: These are the only pacifiers my daughter will sleep with. Because of the design, they stay in her mouth better than the other brands that we have used which can be too small or have too much weight on the base. I love that these glow in the dark, making it easy to find in the middle of the nights, but I have noticed that the glow doesn’t last very long. They are also flashy enough that I can find them hiding amongst the house hold items (on those days when the house isn’t clean....most days). I was worried that they would take up too much of her face because there is so much plastic around the outside part, but it really doesn’t. They look good, stay in and I love not having to worry if they are messing up anything in her mouth, since they are the orthodontist approved ones!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Mam, Love these
reviews.reviewText: I switched my kiddo from the 100% silicone mam pacifier to these just recently. I love these because they are similar in shape to the silicone pacifiers and the 6+ month mam pacifiers. The shape has been great for breastfeeding and my kiddo keeps them in her mouth. I love that water cannot get into the tip of the paci. The glow in the dark feature is a life saver along with the flat circle top. My kiddo likes to have her hands by her face and knocks out all other pacifiers. I wouldn’t suggest these for newborns, my kiddo gagged on them any time we tried them before she was about 4 months, she was tiny and I think they went too deep into her mouth and were too wide when she was younger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Pacifier for both kids
reviews.reviewText: This has been both of my kids favorite pacifier. I tried a few others and this was the winner. Both kids fully breastfed. They are happy at night instead of using me as a pacifier. MAM perfect was recommended by our pediatrician. Have repurchased over and over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 kids and counting
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased these pacifiers so many times now.... They are great. The glow in the dark feature is so handy. When the binky falls out, my 7 month old can easily find it. It's so cute to see his little hands and face go diving for it :) I also like that I can find them when they fall on the floor in the middle of the night.My first child liked these too and they are the only brand of pacifiers we use. Not sure about the teeth aspect, but hey, whatever works. They've soothed both my babies, especially when teething.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2020
reviews.reviewText: My six month old loves these. My boy was using the Philip soothie pacifiers as a newborn but when I switched him to the 3+ month ones he no longer wanted them. So I went on a search for an orthodontic pacifier and am so glad I found these. He had no problem switching to these. I can’t speak for durability since I haven’t had them long but as of right now they seem to be good quality. The glow in the dark works great, you just have to make sure you leave it in the light to charge during the day(I just leave them by the window but not in direct sunlight) and it usually lasts through the night but of course they are not as bright anymore in the mornings. I did however receive a different design for the boy ones then pictured but no big deal they were still blue just with a different center part design. Will also be purchasing the day ones now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simply the best
reviews.reviewText: I did a wide range of research and these are just the best. I love these pacifier. I've used them on most of my kids except 1 and totally regretted it and transitioned her at 1. My 3rd kid was so picky we went with a different brand and now she's having speech delays. With kid 4 I made sure to go back to mam brand pacifier from day 1. These are just better for development. They are easy to sterilize if you have the little container. The only downside is trying to get a clip. I'm not a fan of running a string through the pacifier because it rubs their face, the mam clips I haven't had much luck with. I've used the rubberband type and just loop it around the button part it works for babies but my 22 month old rips it off but she only gets a pacifier at night so its not that big of a deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pacifier Design pictures are deceiving
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love the MAM pacifiers. But be cautious because lately anytime I order, I receive random MAM pacifiers that are not even shown in pictures/design shown when purchasing. No, it’s not a huge deal but very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic my son loves them
reviews.reviewText: From switching from itsyritsy to the regular mam pacifiers to then mam perfect pacifiers, the switch was flawless the moment my son got teeth. I was so worried about his teeth as he's 8 months with 7 teeth and this pacifier puts my worry to rest. I love mam pacifiers in general but I recommend the prefects for those who have babies with an insane number of teeth early on.

Me mudé a México y después de buscarlos por todos lados y tratar de que mi hijo tomara otro de diferentes marcas, no pude! MAM es el favorito de mi bebé, es tan noble con su boca y no tiene ningún problema.
Justo lo que necesitaba. A mi bebé le encantaron.

Muy buenos, solo usamos de esta marca con nuestra hija y que brillen en la obscuridad es realmente un plus. Me gusta que prácticamente mantiene cerrada su boca con ellos lo que provoca menos daño a su dentición.
